user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some ideas for food and desserts. Suggest some creative dishes, desserts, and breweries that offer party-friendly spaces.

TaskList.description: Research creative dishes suitable for a birthday party.
Research unique dessert options for a birthday celebration.
Identify local breweries that have party-friendly spaces for hosting events.
Compile a list of all the researched food, desserts, and breweries into a coherent presentation for planning the party.
